column5: Spent a couple of days camping  on Cold lake off of Gold lake. Weather was unbearablly hot and fishing was hard . But managed to boat three 5 lbs. and a few smaller ones . Overall not a bad couple days of fishing.Want to go back when the weather is a more favrabitle time.Looks like this lake could pull out some monsters.
Nice place to setup camp Mike Yeah talk about weather.... hot is not even close these days. Hope the bite is better on your next trip. Thanks for sharing Leechman
